properties.description: Counter for drag operations to manage drag leave and enter events.

properties.name: activeUploads

properties.description: Mode of file upload, either immediate upon selection or deferred.

properties.name: href
properties.description: The URL that the hyperlink points to.

properties.name: target
properties.description: Where to display the linked URL

properties.name: download
properties.description: Causes the browser to treat the linked URL as a download. Can be used with or without a filename value:

properties.name: hreflang
properties.description: Hints at the human language of the linked URL

properties.name: ping
properties.description: A space-separated list of URLs. When the link is followed, the browser will send POST requests with the body PING to the URLs. Typically for tracking.

properties.name: referrerpolicy
properties.description: How much of the referrer to send when following the link.

properties.name: rel
properties.description: The relationship of the linked URL as space-separated link types.

slots.description: The default slot for the Menu Item's content
